alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Iron; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 10:52PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IRON...SOUTHEASTERN GOGEBIC...SOUTHWESTERN HOUGHTON...SOUTHEASTERN ONTONAGON AND SOUTHWESTERN BARAGA COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT/1015 PM CDT/... At 1051 PM EDT/951 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bruce Crossing to Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Watersmeet, Kenton, Paulding, Sidnaw, Paint Lake, Tamarack Lake, Trout Creek, Thousand Island Lake, Bond Falls, and Golden Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Gogebic; Iron; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
